title.narrative: Scoping Study for Africa Infrastructure Project Preparation Facility

description.narrative: Greater investment in infrastructure is needed to cope with the demands of a rising population and rapid urbanisation. The current funding gap is about $50 billion per year. The funding gap arises from a lack of projects that are sufficiently refined and prepared to be attractive for investment. There are many project preparation facilities in place with work undertaken to understand why they are not as effective as they could be. This project is seeking further analysis within the field of Infrastructure Project Preparation in Africa. The aim is to use the private sector to increase the number of projects that are ready for financing by bridging the expectations gap between the private and public sector.
